title: Home and Away spoilers: Mason discovers a secret about Dr Alex
text:
Alex is getting closer to Mason (Picture: Seven)

Alex (Zoe Ventoura) has been getting to know the locals at Summer Bay, with several people inspired or grateful for her input already. Jasmine (Sam Frost) has enlisted her advice about Robbo’s (Jake Ryan) situation, and Raffy (Olivia Deeble) has been inspired to manage her epilepsy more proactively thanks to her input. Alex has also been getting closer to Willow (Sarah Roberts) after enlisting her as her personal trainer, and she’s recently been surprised to discover that Mason (Orpheus Pledger) is a doctor.

When Alex has the night off, she takes the opportunity to get social, spending time with Willow and Mason in Salt. Willow is full of anxiety about how Bella and Colby are doing with the trial, and Alex offers genuine support. Meanwhile, she encourages Mason’s desire to transfer to Northern Districts for his internship instead of travelling to Western Australia and going to the Pilbara.

Willow is appreciative of the new friendship, especially as Dean (Patrick O’Connor) has had his time taken up with Ziggy (Sophie Dillman) and the Astonis, and Colby (Tim Franklin) has been tied up with Bella (Courtney Miller) and Mackenzie (Emily Weir). Meanwhile, Mason is blown away by the gesture Dr Alex is offering when she offers to put in a good word for him at the hospital, realising she could change his life by helping him to progress his medical career instead of remaining at Summer Bay Fit.

Alex is Tori’s temporary replacement at the hospital (Picture: Seven)

When Willow hears news about Colby and Bella following Irene’s trial, she makes her excuses and leaves to find them for an update, leaving Alex and Mason alone. The pair continue to drink and talk, with Mason getting increasingly flirty. He says he’s grateful to have her on his side, as it’s been a while, and then tells her that he knows she’s new in town, so probably isn’t looking for anything serious.

Alex realises Mason has interpreted her friendship and support incorrectly, so quickly stops him before he goes any further. She says she didn’t mean anything like that, and he presumes she isn’t into him. She clarifies – she isn’t into any guys like that, as she’s gay. Mason looks surprised, while Alex asks him if that’s going to be a problem…
